original_title: マイルド鉄ドン　アホな子　バカな子　マヌケな子
overview: The new anthology of the unique, original and untransferable Tetsudon is suitable for all ages. On this occasion, there will not be sex but there will be high levels of eschatology, surrealism, absurd humor and lots of silliness.
title: Tetsudon: rated T for fools, idiots and dummies
